page.title: 07Gravel Pit near Capel Bangor
page.content: The gravel pits are situated in the Rheidol Valley and owned by A Jones Plant Ltd. The owner lives 5 miles away in Clarach, his mother & father live on the premises. The main work they carry out at the pits is excavating gravel, dredging & quarrying. After 12 years of work, the ponds cover about 10 acres. Mr Jones employs 5 men who all live locally. Within a few years all the work will be finalised, the future plans are for tourism, farm fishing & to attract wildlife which already sports wild geese & ducks, swans and the famous Red Kite which is often seen gracefully gliding above. The gravel pits are part of a haulage/ agricultural contractors & civil engineering business run from Clarach. This gives a lot of needed employment to the area.
